speaker: char
text: This looks interesting! Not exactly what I had in mind, but I can see what I’d like differently and that’s saying something, isn’t it?

speaker: char
text: Like the last two times, I was completely happy with what you did, because I trusted you to know best. This time I have opinions!

speaker: char
text: I’m going to try your advice and be a little bit more myself. Just see how it goes.
